books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: The attorney Sebastian Rudd is a “lone gunman” who hates injustice and the system and defends unpopular clients.
books.name: ROGUE LAWYER

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: The retired detective Harry Bosch reluctantly agrees to help his half brother, a defense attorney, and his investigations lead him inside the L.A.P.D.
books.name: THE CROSSING

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: The Los Angeles P.I. Elvis Cole joins forces with the K-9 officer Scott James of the L.A.P.D. and his German shepherd, Maggie, as well as his partner, Joe Pike, to foil a criminal mastermind.
books.name: THE PROMISE

books.author: by Douglas Preston and Lincoln Child
books.description: In the 15th thriller featuring the F.B.I. agent Aloysius Pendergast, a crime in a quaint Massachusetts town may be connected to rumors of a colony of witches who settled there after the Salem trials.
books.name: CRIMSON SHORE

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Twenty stories, some never before published.
books.name: THE BAZAAR OF BAD DREAMS

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A couple in love are threatened by secrets from the past.
books.name: SEE ME

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Three couples pool their powers in their search for the prophetic fire star.
books.name: STARS OF FORTUNE

books.author: by Mitch Albom
books.description: A preternaturally gifted guitarist uses his talent to alter lives.
books.name: THE MAGIC STRINGS OF FRANKIE PRESTO

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: Is Ben using his relationship with Fallon as fodder for his novel?
books.name: NOVEMBER 9

books.author: by Joanna Wylde
books.description: An abrasive biker's release from prison tests his fraught relationship with a woman escaping her past.
books.name: REAPER'S FALL

books.author: by Vince Flynn and Kyle Mills
books.description: A counterterrorism operative must control the damage from a leak of C.I.A. documents.
books.name: THE SURVIVOR

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: In the third novel about the private investigative team of Cormoran Strike and Robin Ellacott, the pair pursue a psychotic stalker; by J. K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: CAREER OF EVIL

books.author: by Isabel Allende
books.description: A young refugee from the Nazis and the son of her family’s Japanese gardener must hide their love, although it lasts a lifetime.
books.name: THE JAPANESE LOVER
